alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 7:09PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Benton and northwestern Carroll Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Pea Ridge to 3 miles east of Lowell. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Springdale... Rogers... Eureka Springs... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Garfield... Gateway... Beaver... Avoca... Hill Top... Beaver Lake... Walnut Hill... Monte Ne... Larue... Busch... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
